{"id":987127831,"question_id":4,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1688577608,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"26 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/987127831/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"89.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2){\n        int n1 = nums1.size();\n        int n2 = nums2.size();\n        if(n1>n2){\n            return findMedianSortedArrays(nums2,nums1);\n        }\n        int low=0;\n        int high=nums1.size();\n        int l1,l2,r1,r2;\n        while(low<=high){\n            int cut1=(low+high)/2;\n            int cut2=(nums1.size()+nums2.size()+1)/2-cut1;\n            if (cut1 == 0) {l1 = INT_MIN;} \n            else {\n    l1 = nums1[cut1 - 1];}\n\nif (cut2 == 0) {\n    l2 = INT_MIN;\n} else {\n    l2 = nums2[cut2 - 1];\n}\n\nif (cut1 == n1) {\n    r1 = INT_MAX;\n} else {\n    r1 = nums1[cut1];\n}\n\nif (cut2 == n2) {\n    r2 = INT_MAX;\n} else {\n    r2 = nums2[cut2];\n}\nif(l1 <= r2 && l2 <= r1)\n            {\n                if((n1 + n2) % 2 == 0)\n                {\n                    return (max(l1, l2) + min(r1, r2))/2.0;\n                }\n                else\n                {\n                    return max(l1/1.0, l2/1.0);\n                }\n            }\nelse if(l1 > r2)\n            {\n                high = cut1 - 1; \n            }\n            else\n            {\n                low = cut1 + 1;\n            }\n\n    }\n    return 0.0;}\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
